## 概述

我们通过R语言`ISLR`包中股票市场走势的案例来阐述如何使用如下基本分类模型：

- logistic回归
- LDA
- QDA
- KNN


```{r}

# clean the work directory
rm(list = ls())

# set seeds
set.seed(123)

# read dataset
suppressMessages(library(ISLR))
suppressMessages(library(tidyverse))
data("Smarket")
# display the variables
str(Smarket)
# dimensions
dim(Smarket)
# summary of dataset
summary(Smarket)

```
